translation.en: [woman] I'm sick of it, sis. I can't breathe here.
translation.zh: 我受够了 姐妹 我在这儿都快无法呼吸了

translation.en: [sister] What is up with you? Cheryl, calm down.
translation.zh: 你怎么了？雪柔 冷静

translation.en: No, they… they look at you like you're worthless!
translation.zh: 他们看我的眼神仿佛在看一个废物

translation.en: They make you stand there and wait,
translation.zh: 他们让我站在那儿等着

translation.en: like you're some sort of reprobate or something.
Like you're shit on the sole of their shoe!
translation.zh: 就好像我是他们鞋底的屎

translation.en: [sister] Who makes you wait? You're not making any sense.
translation.zh: 谁让你等了？你说话我都听不懂了

translation.en: Is this… one of your dips?
translation.zh: 你又陷入情绪低谷了吗？

translation.en: I was down there earlier asking for help with the rent.
translation.zh: 我刚才在那儿申请租房补助

translation.en: You and Michael need to stop living fancy off those credit cards.
translation.zh: 你和迈克尔不能再靠信用卡充大款了

translation.en: [Cheryl] I won Saleswoman of the Year three times in a row!
translation.zh: 我连续三年都赢得了 年度最佳销售员奖

translation.en: -[baby crying] -[Cheryl] I shouldn't be where I am now!
[sister] Carl! Go check on your sister.
translation.zh: 卡尔 去看看你妹妹

translation.en: I want more. Is it wrong to want more?
translation.zh: 我想要更多 这有什么不对吗？
没有人不想要更多 雪柔

translation.en: [sighing] But we're dealt the cards we're dealt.
translation.zh: 可我们谁也无法改变 命运发到我们手上的那副牌

translation.en: You've… just… gotta… make the most of things.
Now, what time you popping round later?
I'll see you at five, yeah?
[machine] Hello. Your call cannot be taken at the moment,
translation.zh: 您好 您拨打的电话暂时无法接通

translation.en: so please leave your message after the tone.
[machine] Hello. Your call cannot be taken at the moment,
translation.zh: 您好 您拨打的电话暂时无法接通

translation.en: so please leave your message after the tone.
-[phone beeps] -[man impatiently] Cheryl, where are you?
[under breath] Wonderful morning. [aloud] Wonderful morning, isn't it?
translation.zh: 美好的早晨 美好的早晨 是吧？

translation.en: And you're looking just divine, as usual.
translation.zh: 你和往常一样光彩照人

translation.en: You coming to my charity gala this Friday? We're opening up the doors.
translation.zh: 你周五要来参加我的慈善宴会吗？ -我们开始请人了 -好激动！
-帮助冈比亚的残障人士 -听起来太棒了

translation.en: -[woman] Sounds splendid. -Shall I put you down for 500?
translation.zh: -帮助冈比亚的残障人士 -听起来太棒了 我给你登记捐500吗？

translation.en: Oh… no, of course. 550 even. Happy to help.
translation.zh: 不 当然了 550镑吧 很高兴能帮忙

translation.en: [Neve] Well, can't we add more? We want a full house.
translation.zh: 我们不能多请点人吗？ 我想要座无虚席

translation.en: [man] I work in insurance, hon, not hospitality.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我是做保险的 不是开酒店的

translation.en: These things carry weight in the community.
translation.zh: 这种场合在社区中影响力很大

translation.en: I've been working towards this for so long.
-[Neve] How's she getting on? -[woman] Oh, she's a treat.
Isn't she just? What's happened to your hair, darling?
translation.zh: 可不是嘛 你的头发怎么了 亲爱的？

translation.en: Trends are always changing, aren't they?
translation.zh: 潮流总是在变化 不是吗？

translation.en: [woman] Will you be wanting anything for your event?
translation.zh: 你想为你的活动买些什么吗？

translation.en: Mary's been telling me all about it. A signed choir?
translation.zh: 玛丽都跟我说了 手语合唱团？

translation.en: Oh, yes. The Dream of Gerontius by Elgar. The journey of a dead man's soul.
translation.zh: 对 埃尔加的《杰隆修斯之梦》 亡人的灵魂旅程

translation.en: I'll pick up some expensive shampoo later and run you a nice bath.
translation.zh: 待会儿我去买点贵的洗发水 让你舒舒服服地洗个澡

translation.en: When you came here, you didn't even know what a village fête was.
translation.zh: 你当初刚来时 甚至连义卖游园会是什么都不知道

translation.en: Now look at you. Throwing your very own gala!
translation.zh: 现在看看你 要举办自己的宴会了

translation.en: -Well, you must've inspired me. -[chuckles] I'd like to think so.
translation.zh: -一定是你给了我灵感 -要是那样就好了

translation.en: You're a real example of fortitude, Neve.
translation.zh: 你真是坚强的典范 妮芙

translation.en: I understand the impulse to want to give back.
translation.zh: 我可以理解你想要回报社会的冲动

translation.en: It's bringing it all together, my time here.
translation.zh: 也是回顾我在这里的时光

translation.en: And an opportunity to show off the new kitchen.
translation.zh: 也是炫耀一下新厨房的好机会？

translation.en: But, Neve, really, come on, there's nothing to prove here.
translation.zh: 可是 妮芙 你真的不需要证明什么
你几乎就是我们中的一员 -几乎？ -你懂我什么意思的

translation.en: And you are drop-dead gorgeous. You haven't aged a bit.
translation.zh: 而且你简直美若天仙 好像完全不会变老一样

translation.en: Thank you very much. Excuse me. Gotta go to the loo.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 不好意思 我去趟厕所

translation.en: [Neve] Need help with anything in there, sweetheart?
translation.zh: 需要帮忙吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: [Neve] You wouldn't believe what happened to me today. -In the car. -[footsteps approaching]
translation.zh: 你们绝对想不到 今天在车里发生了什么

translation.en: -[boy] Anyone seen my poster? -What poster? Ian.
translation.zh: 有人看到我的海报了吗？ 什么海报？伊恩

translation.en: [boy] The Lil Wayne one? In the gym?
translation.zh: 李尔韦恩的海报 健身房里那张？

translation.en: -Your mum's telling a story. -It's just disappeared, then?
translation.zh: -你妈妈话还没说完呢 -就这样消失了？

translation.en: So, yes, I'd just had tea with Amanda, and I…
translation.zh: 话说 我刚和阿曼达喝完茶 然后…

translation.en: -[Neve] No phones at the table, Mary. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -餐桌上不能用手机 玛丽 -抱歉

translation.en: So I'm driving along, when I see someone dodgy from out of town,
translation.zh: 我在开车时看到 有个形迹可疑的外来人

translation.en: straight into the back of Sonia's car. Near tore off her entire bumper.
translation.zh: 直接撞上了索尼娅的车尾 把她的保险杠整个撞掉了

translation.en: We just hired a girl from out of town.
translation.zh: 我们刚雇了一个外地女孩
一个可爱的年轻黑人女孩

translation.en: What was her name? This girl?

translation.zh: 艾比盖尔 她很有魅力

translation.en: Told you before. It was a side job for a bit when I was 15.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过了 我15岁的时候做过一阵短工
你觉得塞巴斯蒂安还好吗？

translation.en: Are we giving him enough space to, I dunno…
translation.zh: 我们有给他足够的空间… 怎么说呢…
塞巴斯蒂安要什么有什么

translation.en: Speaking of which, I just pre-ordered him the new Xbox for his birthday.
translation.zh: 说到这个 我刚为他的生日预定了新的游戏机

translation.en: What's wrong with the one he has?
[Ian] You don't have to cover it up.
I know I don't have to.
[Ian] I used to love the way you had it before.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你以前的样子

translation.en: Well, thanks for letting your feelings be known.
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我知道你的感受

translation.en: Come on, you know what I mean.
translation.zh: 拜托 你懂我的意思

translation.en: Let's go to sleep, shall we?
I'll be in in a mo.
Sebas, have you been drawing on the mirrors?
translation.zh: 塞巴斯 你有在镜子上画画吗？
早上好 威廉姆斯老师

translation.en: [man] Castle Combe School has, yet again,
outperformed other private schools across the country.
translation.zh: 超过全国其他私立学校

translation.en: And, for the fifth year in a row,
our deputy head and theology course leader, Mrs. Williams,
translation.zh: 我们的副校长兼神学老师 威廉姆斯夫人

translation.en: has outdone us all with the most A-stars this senior year.
translation.zh: 班上的全A学生数量最多

translation.en: [man] Even if she still hasn't given in her references.
[laughs] Well, I'd accept another medal, but I'm currently out of wall space.
translation.zh: 我很乐意再领一个奖 但我家墙壁都没地方挂了

translation.en: Come on, girls! This isn't a photo shoot. Off to class immediately.
translation.zh: 快点 姑娘们 这不是拍摄现场 快去上课
塞巴斯 塞巴斯蒂安！

translation.en: -Shouldn't you be in class? -Yeah, I'm on my way.
translation.zh: -你不该去上课吗？ -是啊 我在路上了

translation.en: Well, then. Instead of talking to strangers.
translation.zh: 那你就去 而不是跟陌生人说话

translation.en: Have you got your phone on you? [Sebastian] Maybe.
Keep it on. In case I need to get hold of you.
translation.zh: 保持开机状态 我可能需要找你
接下来 开始发声唱

translation.en: "Who?" This is the game you wanna play with me?
Don't treat me like a fool! I can suspend you, young man.
translation.zh: -我买的 -别把我当傻子 我可以让你停学 年轻人 别忘了

translation.en: Don't forget, I am your mother and the headmistress.
[breathes anxiously] Basketball, yes. Of course. Basketball.
translation.zh: 篮球 当然了 篮球

translation.en: -Are you all right? -Yes, yes, I'm fine. I'm fine.
-I'll see you later. -Jessie's dropping you back?
[impatiently] Yes, Mum. Yes. Love you. Bye.
translation.zh: 是的 妈妈 爱你 再见

translation.en: [Amanda] Hello, my darling. Sorry we're late. [Ian] No worries.
translation.zh: -你好 亲爱的 抱歉我们迟到了 -没关系
-贝瑞又忙着做头发了 -真好笑

translation.en: [Amanda] Wow, the spices. Really, so yummy.
translation.zh: 哇 香料的味道 真香

translation.en: I don't know how you do it, Neve.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是怎么做到的 妮芙

translation.en: Barry's always complaining about my boiled chicken.
translation.zh: 贝瑞总是抱怨我做的煮鸡肉不好吃

translation.en: -Is he? -[Amanda] You have to teach me.
You'll have to teach me one of your secret concoctions.
-We could make a night of it. -We could.
that the mainstream media are scared to touch.
translation.zh: 主流媒体不敢碰的话题

translation.en: "White flight." That's how he phrased it on the podcast.
translation.zh: “白人大迁移” 他在播客上就是这么说的

translation.en: -What is it? -[Ian] Can we talk about something else?
translation.zh: -什么意思？ -我们能谈点别的吗？

translation.en: It's when white people flee urban areas for the suburbs.
translation.zh: 意思是白人从市区逃去郊区

translation.en: -Why are they fleeing? -[Ian] Because they're uncultured.
translation.zh: -他们为什么要逃跑？ -因为他们没有文化

translation.en: [man] It has nothing to do with culture.
-[Neve] At the window! -[man] Can't see anything.
translation.zh: -宝贝？ -窗外 我什么都没看见

translation.en: Something's coming. Someone's there. Can't you see?
translation.zh: 有东西冲过来了 有人在那里 你们看不见吗？

translation.en: [Amanda] Hey! Oh, look at you! I love your hair like that.
translation.zh: -嘿 -嘿！ 看看你！我好喜欢你的发型

translation.en: Who did your hair like that?
translation.zh: 谁把你头发编成这样的？
艾米丽 -你哥哥呢？ -打篮球

translation.en: I think it's time we made a move. Was lovely.
translation.zh: 看来我们是时候离开了 愉快的时光总是短暂

translation.en: [Amanda] Yes. Wouldn't want to overstay our welcome.
translation.zh: 对 待太久也不好意思
晚安 亲爱的 晚安

translation.en: -[door shuts] -[Neve] What time does basketball finish?
[Ian] He attended basketball. Had a great game, apparently.
translation.zh: 他去打篮球 显然玩得很开心

translation.en: Uh, the others went for some food after to celebrate the win,
translation.zh: 其他人之后一起去吃饭庆祝胜利

translation.en: There are people out to hurt us. Out to bring violence against us.
translation.zh: 外面有人要伤害我们 对我们施暴

translation.en: Who's out to bring violence against us? What is wrong with you tonight? Really?
translation.zh: 谁来对我们施暴？ 你今晚到底怎么了？

translation.en: You know how these things are.
Young boy's meeting a girl after a good game, on the quiet.
translation.zh: 年轻人打了一场痛快的比赛 就去和女孩私会了

translation.en: Eh, Ian? Doesn't want anyone pulling the rug from under his feet.
translation.zh: 伊恩？不想有人去打扰他
是啊 你这么说也对

translation.en: [man] Tell you what. I'll head out now and do another round of the town.
translation.zh: 告诉你 我再去城里逛一圈

translation.en: -I'm sure he'll turn up. -[Ian] Thanks, Ken.
translation.zh: -他肯定会出现的 -谢谢你 肯

translation.en: ten minutes from the village of Santa María de Nieva, is still on the…
translation.zh: 离圣玛利亚德涅瓦只有十分钟 目前还在挂牌待售中
你让我给你找间独栋房屋

translation.en: [TV] We've come ten minutes up the valley from where we just were,
translation.zh: 所以我们顺着山谷往上走了十分钟

translation.en: and we've got a detached house.
Where the hell have you been?!
Out? You, you didn't call. You didn't leave a message.
translation.zh: 出去？你没打电话 你没有留言

translation.en: [Sebastian] Well, I'm back now, so just chill!
translation.zh: 我都回来了 冷静一下

translation.en: [Sebastian] Ah! Mum, fucking what you doing?!

translation.zh: 理想情况下 应该开除他

translation.en: In fact, just let him go.
Did you see him give Sebastian the cigarette?
translation.zh: 你看到他把香烟给塞巴斯蒂安了吗？

translation.en: Well, where else did he get them?
translation.zh: 不然他是从哪儿弄来的？

translation.en: [hesitates] Uh, uh, I'm, I'm just saying,
you know, if we're to go through the proper channels.
Otherwise, you know, it could seem like I'm… like we're…
translation.zh: 不然 这看起来像是我…我们在…

translation.en: Well, a formal warning will suffice for now.
translation.zh: 目前 正式警告就足够了

translation.en: ♪ Not by the token Of this faltering breath ♪
translation.zh: 这颤抖的呼吸也无法证明

translation.en: Okay, you know the drill. Don't panic. Mary, start the line.
translation.zh: 好 你们知道该怎么做 别慌 玛丽 你排第一
快点各位 拿上东西

translation.en: Nice and ordered. Come along now, quickly. Quickly, quickly. Let's go.
translation.zh: 有序离场 快点过来 走吧

translation.en: Guys, carry on straight down into the outer grounds,
I'm just doing a toilet check.
You tried to get me fired.
-You want me gone? -Please, it's not what you think.
translation.zh: -你想让我走？ -拜托 这不是你想的那样

translation.en: You erased us! We thought you were dead!
translation.zh: 你把我们抹去了！ 我们还以为你死了！

translation.en: It's not me! I'm not her!
So lovely to see you both. Thank you for coming.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到两位 谢谢你们来做客

translation.en: -[Neve] Oh, thank you. -Thanks so much. -[Neve] Really appreciate… -So nice.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我很感激你们赏光前来

translation.en: [Neve] Of course. My pleasure. Hello, darling.
-[Ian] Excuse me. Ready to speak? -[Neve] Yes, two minutes. You okay, babe?
translation.zh: -你好 亲爱的 -打扰了 准备好发言了吗？ 嗯 两分钟 -你还好吗 宝贝？ -嗯 祝你好运
-你还好吗 宝贝？ -嗯 祝你好运
-各位 大家都好美啊 -你好

translation.en: -[Neve] All looking wonderful! -[woman] It's all marvelous.
translation.zh: -各位 大家都好美啊 -你好 -布置得很好 -谢谢

translation.en: -[Neve] Thank you. Cakes look delicious. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -布置得很好 -谢谢 -蛋糕看起来很好吃 -谢谢
麦克风测试 一 二

translation.en: A massive thank you to you all for making generous contributions,
translation.zh: 非常感谢各位慷慨解囊

translation.en: Today, we dedicate our time to those less fortunate,
translation.zh: 今天我们把时间献给不幸的人

translation.en: where access to the basics becomes a gargantuan struggle.
translation.zh: 需要付出巨大努力才能 得到生活必需品的人

translation.en: Where simple eye or ear infections
translation.zh: 最普通的眼睛或耳朵感染

translation.en: can lead to blindness and deafness.
When a simple course of antibiotics
could afford that child a life of seeing the sunrise
translation.zh: 就能让那个孩子看到日出
在早上 听到鸟儿的…

translation.en: As an ode to these unfortunate individuals,
translation.zh: 为了向这些不幸的人致敬

translation.en: our very own choir will perform "The Dream of Gerontius" in sign.
translation.zh: 我们的合唱团将用手语演唱 《杰隆修斯之梦》

translation.en: The journey of a dead man's soul.
♪ Jesu, Maria, I am near to death ♪
translation.zh: 耶稣 玛丽亚 我离死亡不远了

translation.en: ♪ Jesu, Maria, I am near to death ♪
translation.zh: 耶稣 玛丽亚 我离死亡不远了

translation.en: ♪ Not by the token Of this faltering breath ♪
translation.zh: 颤抖的呼吸也无法证明

translation.en: [becoming muted] ♪ This dampness on my brow ♪
What kind of sordid, messed-up game are you playing?
translation.zh: 你在玩什么肮脏的游戏？

translation.en: You, you turn up out of the blue and, and pollute the environment.
translation.zh: 你不请自来 污染环境

translation.en: No! No, we will not play your messed-up, twisted game anymore.
translation.zh: 不！ 我们不想再玩这种肮脏的把戏

translation.en: ♪ Everybody wants to know Where 'Walk in the Park' is ♪ ♪ Walk in the party, sporting Armani ♪ ♪ Half of the crowd's All snorting my Charlie ♪
♪ Sorted the bar Time to sort the punani ♪ ♪ Chicks looking at me Like, "Talk to me, darlin'" ♪ -♪ Jheeze ♪ -♪ Hollering at man ♪
-♪ Pour me a drink, big fur jacket… ♪ -Hey.
Hi. Um… How can I help you?
I've still got my first teddy.
translation.zh: 我还保存着我的第一只泰迪熊呢

translation.en: Two singles if you have it. Please.
translation.zh: 两张单人床 如果可以的话 劳驾

translation.en: How long are you thinking of staying?
You'll have to iron it. Make it look nice.
translation.zh: 你得熨一下 漂亮些

translation.en: I wouldn't get your hopes up.
[TV narrator] Mrs. John Q. Public no longer finds housework…
translation.zh: 张三夫人不再觉得家务…

translation.en: -Nothing. -Thanks to a host of labor-saving devices.
translation.zh: -你在看什么？ -没什么 …很多节省体力的设备
也许我们应该带点东西来
我们带了 带来了自己

translation.en: Can't wait until it gets to tomorrow.
-[girl] Oh my! Hansel, look! -[Hansel] Wow! What is it?
translation.zh: 我的天！汉塞尔 看！ 哇！这是什么？

translation.en: -[Hansel] I'm gonna try some. -[girl] Me too!

translation.zh: 你们好 我的小宝贝们

translation.en: It's bringing it all together, my time here.
translation.zh: 也是回顾我在这里的时光

translation.en: [Amanda] And a chance to show off the new kitchen?
translation.zh: 也是炫耀一下新厨房的好机会？

translation.en: [Ian] Let's see. What kind of experience do you have?
translation.zh: 来看看 你都有些什么经验？

translation.en: I haven't been down to London in a while.
You remind me of her. My wife.
translation.zh: 你长得还有点像她呢 我妻子

translation.en: [man] The school has a great history.
It was commissioned by Queen Victoria.
translation.zh: 受维多利亚女王委托建立的

translation.en: I worked a few period buildings abroad.
translation.zh: 我在好几栋国外的古建筑里工作过

translation.en: Some of my best days were sat in the Kop end,
translation.zh: 我最美好的时光就是在南看台度过的

translation.en: 20,000 strong, sucking the ball into the back of the net.
translation.zh: 两万球迷把球吸进球门

translation.en: Hey. The only color that matters. Team colors.
translation.zh: 唯一重要的颜色 球队颜色

translation.en: I saw your photograph. In the shop.
translation.zh: 我看到了你的照片 我在店里工作 直到我能自食其力

translation.en: -I'm working there until I get on my feet. -Okay.
translation.zh: 我在店里工作 直到我能自食其力 好

translation.en: -My dad certainly thinks so. -I like your hair.
translation.zh: -我爸肯定是这么想的 -我喜欢你的头发

translation.en: I sometimes rock mine like that.
translation.zh: 我有时候也会绑成那样

translation.en: Cool. Uh… I'm still refining it, but yeah.
translation.zh: 我还在学着绑呢 但没错
有机会一起约出来玩吧

translation.en: I'll Facebook you. You got an alias?
translation.zh: 我加你好友 你有假名吗？

translation.en: Um, not quite an alias. Just Mary.
translation.zh: 不是什么假名 就是玛丽威廉姆斯

translation.en: Williams. With a hashtag at the end.
translation.zh: 不是什么假名 就是玛丽威廉姆斯 后面有个井号 所以算是吧
后面有个井号 所以算是吧

translation.en: But you can call me Abi.
[Carl, middle-class accent] A parking ticket, yes. Exactly.
translation.zh: 一张停车罚单 没错

translation.en: What address is the vehicle registered to?
I share the car with my wife, and we recently had a breakup, you see.
translation.zh: 我跟我老婆一起开 我们最近分手了
没错 就是这个地址

translation.en: I'll just tear up the ticket. Great.
translation.zh: 那我把罚单撕了 很好

translation.en: -She hasn't accepted my request. -Just be patient.
translation.zh: -她没有接受我的请求 -耐心点

translation.en: I can't look at her photos unless she accepts it!
translation.zh: 她接受我的请求后我才能看她的照片

translation.en: Don't forget why we came here. You get?
translation.zh: 别忘了我们来这里的原因 懂吗？

translation.en: [Neve] So, yes, I'd just had tea with Amanda, and I…
translation.zh: 话说 我和刚和阿曼达喝完茶 然后…

translation.en: [Neve] No phones at the table, Mary.
translation.zh: 餐桌上不能用手机 玛丽

translation.en: Where's your mum at? Been dreaming about her.
translation.zh: 你妈在哪里？我一直梦到她

translation.en: [patronizingly] Ooh! Let me know when you're ready to man up, freak.
translation.zh: 等你是个男人了通知我一声 怪胎

translation.en: -[Neve] Off to class with you. -[bully] Fuckin' inbreds.
-It's what happens when you're different. -[Neve] Sebas.
translation.zh: 与众不同就会有这样的后果 塞巴斯

translation.en: It's kinda shit when your mum's the deputy head.
translation.zh: 妈妈是副校长真的很烦人

translation.en: [Carl] Shouldn't let people treat you like that.
translation.zh: 不应该让别人那样对你

translation.en: -You got a light? -Uh… I didn't think that…
translation.zh: 你有打火机吗？ -没有 -开玩笑的

translation.en: It's all white label now. No graphics.
translation.zh: 现在全是白标 没有图了
好像那能阻止我们似的

translation.en: [tuts] Oh, you… Take that down, man. Yo, like this.
[Neve] Who? This is the game you wanna play with me?
-[Sebastian] I bought them. -[Neve] Don't treat me like a fool!
Brotherly Cover, how can I help?
translation.zh: 兄弟保险 请问有什么能帮忙的？

translation.en: -See you later. -[Neve] Jessie's dropping you back?
translation.zh: -一会儿见 -杰西待会儿送你回来？

translation.en: [Mary irritably] Yes, Mum. Yes. Love you. Bye.
translation.zh: 是的 妈妈 -爱你 再见 -再见

translation.en: [Dione] Good. I'm good. I'm excited for this party.
translation.zh: 很好 想到这个派对我就兴奋
天 我们配合太妙了

translation.en: [Carl] Did good, man. You did good.
Thanks, man. And I thought it was dope when you whistled.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你吹口哨的时候太帅了

translation.en: First time for everything. Ain't no shame in that.
translation.zh: 凡事都有第一次 没什么好害羞的

translation.en: Yo, this is some Alice-in-Wonderland shit.
translation.zh: 像《爱丽丝梦游仙境》里一样

translation.en: [slurring] Let us see what's in here.
translation.zh: 我们来看看里面有什么

translation.en: Pick what you want. Try anything.
translation.zh: 随便挑 什么都试试

translation.en: Just look at all these cakes. We're like…
translation.zh: 看看这些蛋糕 我们就像是…

translation.en: -You'd look killer in it. -I'll wear it to prom.
translation.zh: -你穿这件肯定美呆 -我会穿去毕业舞会的
毕业舞会？像电影里的那样？

translation.en: -Prom like in the movies? -Yeah. You never been to one?
translation.zh: 毕业舞会？像电影里的那样？ 对 你没参加过吗？
-我们从来不… -我妈要办一场宴会

translation.en: It'll be fussy, but there'll be a lot of free food and drink. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 虽然很正式很烦人 不过吃喝免费

translation.en: [US accent] What do you reckon, homie?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样 老友？

translation.en: I bet you've always… been the favorite.
And sings to you when you sleep, doesn't she?
translation.zh: 唱歌哄你入睡 是不是？

translation.en: [angrily] And that makes it all right when the meanies are out and about.
translation.zh: 所以就算偶尔会出现凶巴巴的时候 一切也就没关系了？

translation.en: Can't wait till this all comes out.
translation.zh: 我盼望真相大白的那天

translation.en: Just got to go to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 没事 要去趟洗手间

translation.en: [Sebastian] So, what brings you to Combe?
[Carl] Thought I'd add some color to the place.
[Sebastian chuckles] Yeah, there ain't no other Blacks around.
translation.zh: 是啊 这儿没有别的黑人

translation.en: No. I mean, I guess I'm kinda…
Thinks she's white. Never says anything about her past.
translation.zh: 她觉得她是白人 从来不提她的过去
搞什么？ 任何和黑人有关的 提都不能提

translation.en: Shit, man. This weed is strong.
[Carl] You think you'd survive that drop?
translation.zh: 你觉得你跳下去能活吗？

translation.en: Do you think you'd survive it?
Lean over the edge and have a look.
-Why? -I thought you were on this man shit!
translation.zh: -为什么？ -我以为你想变男人呢！

translation.en: Now you're ready for the next level.
translation.zh: 准备好进入下一关了吗？

translation.en: -You need to stop picking on my bro. -[whimpering]
[Carl] Do it, Sebas. Do it now!
translation.zh: 动手啊 塞巴斯 快！

translation.en: [Carl] What the fuck are you waiting for? -[bully whimpers] -[Carl] Do it!
translation.zh: 你他妈在等什么？快他妈动手啊！
我和玛丽 最受宠的孩子

translation.en: Nothing's wrong with me, okay? I'm done pretending.
translation.zh: 我没有毛病 好吗？我不想再装了

translation.en: We should up and leave now.
[Dione] We've been invited to the gala.
translation.zh: 我们被邀请去参加宴会了

translation.en: I never got to go to prom.
translation.zh: 我还从没去过毕业舞会

translation.en: Sure you wanna go through with this?

translation.zh: 就不能满足我一次吗？ 我的毕业舞会

translation.en: This is all you! It's all you!
Get off me! It's all you!
No, you didn't let me get one day!
It looks to me like your two Black children just showed…
translation.zh: 在我看来 你的两个黑人孩子就这么出现了

translation.en: "See?" This is somehow on me? You're, you're, you're gonna explain…
translation.zh: 这变成我的错了？ 你要解释…

translation.en: -[Sebastian] Why didn't you tell us? -They grew up with their father. He…
translation.zh: -你为何不告诉我们？ -他们跟他们的父亲一起长大

translation.en: He was a bad man. I…
I had to escape, so I, I, I, just…
translation.zh: 我必须逃跑 所以我…
你就这样抛下他们离开了？
这太乱来了 这太他妈扭曲了！

translation.en: -This is so, so fucked! -Let her explain. Mum, tell us how…
translation.zh: 这太乱来了 这太他妈扭曲了！ 让她解释 妈妈 跟我们说说

translation.en: Don't make out you would have been up for raising
translation.zh: 别说的好像你愿意养两个 不是你亲生的

translation.en: two Black children who weren't yours, Ian!
translation.zh: 黑人孩子似的 伊恩
我可能会愿意的 或许吧

translation.en: I did what I had to do.
What fathers do all the time.
No, they haven't gone about things conventionally.
translation.zh: 他们的行事风格不太传统
都是十六七年前的事了

translation.en: There is something that I have to do.
[woman] Hey. Can I get you guys anything?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们有什么需要吗？

translation.en: Just let me know when your third party arrives.
Have you ordered anything? Is there anything you want?
translation.zh: 你们点吃的了吗？有什么想要的吗？

translation.en: -Thanks for agreeing to meet with me. -[woman] Hey, team!
Specials are at the bottom. Can I get you anything to drink?
translation.zh: 特别套餐在最下面 有什么想喝的吗？

translation.en: -We don't stock alcohol… -Just… Maybe just some tea.
translation.zh: -我们这里不卖酒 -来点茶就好
看看你们俩 我几乎没认出你们

translation.en: -I hardly recognized you. -What happened to your accent?
translation.zh: 看看你们俩 我几乎没认出你们 -你的口音怎么了？ -你讨厌做黑人吗？
-你的口音怎么了？ -你讨厌做黑人吗？ 不

translation.en: No, no, I'm a proud Black woman.
translation.zh: 不 我是个骄傲的黑人女性

translation.en: I'm so sorry for my outburst. I…
I don't know what came over me.
I've been under the most amount of stress, and…
That's what I'm here to do.
translation.zh: 这就是我来这里的目的

translation.en: [spluttering] It hasn't been a straightforward journey.
translation.zh: 我的人生走了很多岔路

translation.en: There have been things that have happened that…
You said you were going to the hairdressers, 18 years ago.
translation.zh: 18年前 你说你要去理发店

translation.en: -Your father, he was a very dangerous man. -You weren't exactly perfect either.
translation.zh: -你父亲是个非常危险的人 -你也不是个完美的人

translation.en: I don't know if you remember what it was like.
translation.zh: 我不知道 你是否记得我们住在冷港的日子
我不知道 你是否记得我们住在冷港的日子 -这是给我下套吗？ -不 我…
你为什么不带我们一起走？

translation.en: -Why didn't you take us with you? -I left you with your auntie.
translation.zh: 你为什么不带我们一起走？ 我把你们留给阿姨了

translation.en: She gave us away. She didn't want us.
translation.zh: 她把我们送走了 她不想要我们

translation.en: [woman] Careful, guys! The tea is super hot.
translation.zh: 小心 茶很烫 不想有人烫伤自己

translation.en: -Don't want anybody to scald themselves. -Would you fuck off!
translation.zh: 小心 茶很烫 不想有人烫伤自己 你能不能滚开？

translation.en: I should have written. I should have reached out.
translation.zh: 我应该写信 应该联系你们

translation.en: I can't imagine what you must think of me. I'm still struggling to process it myself.
translation.zh: 我无法想象你们会如何看我 我也还在努力理清这件事

translation.en: Are we… going to move in?
And I've been thinking of how I can make things right.
translation.zh: 我一直在想 我该如何弥补

translation.en: And it appears to me that, right now,
translation.zh: 在我看来 此时此刻

translation.en: it's important that you both are able to get back on your feet.
translation.zh: 重要的是你们能有个稳定的生活环境

translation.en: I wish I could give more.
translation.zh: 我好希望我能再多给一点

translation.en: Maybe I can. Down the line.

translation.zh: 这里是一张是两万英镑的支票

translation.en: If you go back to London,
translation.zh: 如果你们回伦敦去的话

translation.en: it will give you a chance to get back on your feet.
translation.zh: 这能帮助你们找到稳定的生活环境

translation.en: Until we can find a way to work it all out.
I've broken it down into two separate checks
[Neve] There's no excuse for my behavior.
translation.zh: 我没法为自己的所作所为找借口
我受了极大的心理创伤
我本来根本不想要她的

translation.en: Who knows what would have happened if I'd stayed?
translation.zh: 谁知道我留下来会怎么样？

translation.en: I saw an opportunity, and I went for it.
translation.zh: 我看到一个机会就去争取了

translation.en: All this is just restless curiosity.
translation.zh: 是因为我按耐不住的好奇心

translation.en: People need to know who they are.
translation.zh: 人们需要知道自己是谁

translation.en: Where they're from. Like… on those programs.
translation.zh: 他们来自哪里 就像电视节目里那样
不会改变我们的生活的
他们走了 目前是这样

translation.en: -Will we ever see them again? -Don't you even want to?
translation.zh: -我们会再见到他们吗？ -你难道就不想吗？

translation.en: We need to heal a bit first. Don't we?
translation.zh: 我们的伤口得先愈合 对吧？

translation.en: Now it's important to rebuild our defenses
translation.zh: 现在重要的是 重建我们的堡垒

translation.en: and remember that we love each other.
Whatever happened before doesn't change that.
translation.zh: 之前发生的事不会改变这一点

translation.en: There will be many more conversations to come.
translation.zh: 我们以后还会进行很多次谈话

translation.en: [TV narrator] Together, they can better defend their territory.
translation.zh: 团结一致 让它们能更好地守护领地

translation.en: Now this is… Gosh, this is…

translation.zh: 这戒指简直是美轮美奂

translation.en: It is one of the nicest…
Oh my gosh, look at this ring!
-[Dione] Think I might have a bath. -[Carl] Have you got a clean towel?
translation.zh: 我想洗个澡 你有干净的毛巾吗？

translation.en: [Neve] What are you doing, taking a bath at this hour?
[Carl] Know where the clean towels are kept?
translation.zh: 你知道干净毛巾在哪儿吗？

translation.en: [Dione] I checked the cupboards but couldn't find any clean ones.
translation.zh: 我在橱柜看过了 但找不到干净的

translation.en: Right, okay. You never mentioned you were coming round.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们没说过你们会来
今天是艾比盖尔的生日

translation.en: We thought it would be a great idea to bring it in together.
translation.zh: 我们觉得大家一起庆祝挺好的
塞巴斯 你怎么看 兄弟？ 我不是故意要吵醒你的

translation.en: -Didn't mean to wake you. -[Dione] Hey, M!
translation.zh: 塞巴斯 你怎么看 兄弟？ 我不是故意要吵醒你的 嘿 玛丽！
嗨 伊恩 你猜怎么着？

translation.en: -Please, I know how you must be… -[Dione] Where do you keep clean towels?
translation.zh: -我知道你肯定觉得… -你们把毛巾放在哪里？

translation.en: [Carl] Is it washday, Mum? Ian, washday?
translation.zh: 今天是洗衣日吗 妈妈？ 伊恩 洗衣日？

translation.en: We'll do it like that. On me.
I like the hair. You bringing it back to the '90s?
translation.zh: 我喜欢这发型 你走90年代复古风吗？
不然你看我能做出什么

translation.en: I'm going Singapore noodle and sweet-and-sour chicken.
translation.zh: 我要新加坡面和糖醋鸡

translation.en: Mary, go and get the house phone so we can put the order in.
translation.zh: 玛丽 去拿家里的电话 让我们下单
谁记一下？玛丽 你记下来了吗？
谁记一下？玛丽 你记下来了吗？ 等等 我之前完全不知道妮芙的过去…

translation.en: I was totally unaware of what happened in the past with Neve…
translation.zh: 等等 我之前完全不知道妮芙的过去…

translation.en: Oh… It was a terrible mix-up.
It's all just been a terrible confusion. I mean, I…
translation.zh: 肯定是有很可怕的误解 我是说…

translation.en: We don't condone what she did.
translation.zh: 我们也无法容忍她的所作所为

translation.en: We demanded answers too, like the two of you.
translation.zh: 我们也要一个答案 就像你俩一样

translation.en: Now you, Sebas. I seen you on the court. I know you got an appetite.
translation.zh: 到你了 塞巴斯 我看见你打球了 我知道你有胃口

translation.en: Gonna be a feast. I like.
translation.zh: 会是一场盛宴 我喜欢

translation.en: I clocked a gym back there.
translation.zh: 我看到后面有个健身房

translation.en: [mocking disbelief] A gym, you know? In the house.
We should do a family photograph.
[Carl] After we sorted the order, we can do a family photo.
translation.zh: 我们下单之后就拍张全家福

translation.en: But it's my turn to be in the middle.
translation.zh: 但现在轮到我站中间了

translation.en: -I'll just have a bit of everyone else's. -You sure? I'm buying.
translation.zh: -我吃点别人点的就好 -你确定吗？ 我买单
玛丽 打电话给他们

translation.en: [shakily] Shall I turn the water off?
[machine] I'm sorry, but we're currently closed.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们已经停止营业了

translation.en: Our opening hours are 12:00 to 11:00, Monday to Sunday. Please call back later.
translation.zh: 营业时间为周一到周日 12点至11点 请稍后再拨

translation.en: They got Uber Eats in Castle Combe? Ian.
Take my phone, Mary. You find a Chinese.
translation.zh: 拿着我的手机 玛丽 你找家中餐厅

translation.en: Now… I know you must be hurting…
-Would you repeat? -I know you must be in pain…
translation.zh: -你能重复吗？ -我知道你一定很痛苦…

translation.en: [Mary] Yep. I found a good one. [Carl] That's my girl.
translation.zh: -我找到了一家不错的 -这才是好样的

translation.en: [Dione] Aren't you gonna wish me happy birthday?
translation.zh: 你们不祝我生日快乐吗？

translation.en: [Carl] Come on. It's her fucking birthday.
translation.zh: 别这样 今天他妈是她的生日啊

translation.en: Well, don't just stand there. Sing!
-[Neve] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Dione ♪ -[others] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Abi ♪
translation.zh: -生日快乐 亲爱的迪昂 -生日快乐 亲爱的艾比

translation.en: We got no board game ting.
-We must've missed a fair few board games. -[Dione] Mmm.
translation.zh: 我们肯定在圣诞节和生日

translation.en: How many birthdays is that anyway? Fifteen?

translation.zh: 你有拼字游戏吗 伊恩？

translation.en: Yes, I believe we have Scrabble somewhere.
translation.zh: 有 我相信我们有拼字游戏

translation.en: [Carl] Sebas. You go with Abs and find the board game while we set the table up.
translation.zh: 塞巴斯 你和艾比去拿桌游 我们来摆桌子

translation.en: Set the fucking table, will ya?
translation.zh: 他妈的摆好桌子 好吗？

translation.en: Did you write the check or did she?
translation.zh: 支票是你写的还是她写的？

translation.en: The 20K she just tried to buy us off with.
You tried to pay them off?
We could have given more. I was just trying to help.
translation.zh: 我们可以给更多的 我只是想帮忙

translation.en: Neve, what the hell is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 妮芙 你到底是怎么了？

translation.en: But what could I get for that? It's about a grand for each year, right?
translation.zh: 那是怎么算呢？ 一年一千 对吧？

translation.en: Wetting the bed until just recently.
What you buying back with yours, Abs?
translation.zh: 你用你的钱买了什么 艾比？

translation.en: And all the things they've done.
[Carl yelling] You do that, sis! You do exactly that!
translation.zh: 就该这么做 妹妹！你就这么做

translation.en: But for now, we're just buying back Cheryl.
translation.zh: 但现在 我们只要买回雪柔

translation.en: This has always been a family favorite.
translation.zh: 这本来就是我们家最爱玩的

translation.en: Seems the perfect way to introduce Carl and Dione to the flock.
translation.zh: 是把卡尔和迪昂介绍 给大家认识的完美方式

translation.en: I see now, this is as it should be, isn't it?
translation.zh: 我现在知道 本该如此

translation.en: With all of us gathered around.
[Sebastian] Dad, stop it. Can't we try?
translation.zh: 爸 别说了 就不能试试吗？
这样就剩下爸爸妈妈了

translation.en: [Sebastian] Mum? Dad? What have you got?
translation.zh: 妈妈 爸爸 你们有什么？

translation.en: Let's see, what word do we have here? Ian?
[quavers] Yeah. [fakes positivity] What have we got?

translation.zh: -真有趣 -可不是吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Let me know when you want to do that photograph, Dione.
translation.zh: 想拍全家福的时候跟我说 迪昂
她是不是很漂亮 玛丽？

translation.en: [Dione] I wanna play the game! It's my birthday! I get to choose!
translation.zh: 我想玩游戏 今天是我的生日 应该让我选！

translation.en: -[Neve] I'm sure we can find another game. -Me and Ian are gonna do a little workout.
translation.zh: 肯定还有别的游戏 我和伊恩要去健一下身
我们是一家人 对吧 伊恩？

translation.en: I'll be all right. I'll talk to him.
translation.zh: 我会没事的 我去跟他谈谈

translation.en: [Carl] What kinda KG you pushing these days? -A bit. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -你最近在举多重的呀？ -一点点

translation.en: Must be more than a bit.
[Neve chuckling] Aren't you funny? Yes, something like that.
Not sure I've delivered here before. Nice house.
translation.zh: 不知我有没有送过这儿 房子不错

translation.en: We didn't think we'd find anywhere, what with it being so late.
translation.zh: 我们都没想到还能找到餐厅 毕竟天都这么晚了

translation.en: Let me get you a tip for being so accommodating.
translation.zh: 为了感谢你的帮忙 我给你点小费吧
等等 在这儿等一下
对 没错 做得好

translation.en: -You ain't walking away that easy. -[Ian gurgles]
translation.zh: 你可不能这样轻松逃脱

translation.en: You made your bed with us.
I'm very sorry for how this has turned out.
translation.zh: 我为这件事感到很抱歉

translation.en: I hope one day you can forgive me.
Let me tip the man, and then we'll eat and discuss.
translation.zh: 让我给他小费 然后我们边吃边讨论
